name: Punch Punch! (Design Week Project)
description:
Description:

This Alt-Control game was presented by Team 26 at Sheridan Design Week 2022 Fall.

As a boxer, your task is to beat your opponent in the ring!


Control:

This is an Alt-Control game, but you can still play with the ↑ keys

Credit:

Design & Artist & Crafting: Alben Gloria, Zachary Richardson, Eddie Haley,  Owen Brecknock

Programmer: Cheng Zeng (Mason)
